questions.question: Which of the following are benefits of reproducible image analysis workflows?
In CellProfiler, which module is typically used to measure the average intensity of a signal inside segmented objects?
What is the purpose of using the 'RelateObjects' module in CellProfiler?
Which of the following statements about analysis pipelines is FALSE?
options: Pipelines help automate image analysis steps
Pipelines store parameter settings and can be reused
Pipelines make results harder to reproduce
Pipelines can be modular and configurable
questions.answer: Pipelines make results harder to reproduce

questions.question: Which of the following are typical steps in an image analysis pipeline?
